name: Oranges (Piers)
description:
Controls:

PC: Arrow keys or WASD to move. Click the icon at the bottom right of the game window to go full screen.

Mobile: Swipe to move.

Walk into things to interact with them.

Press/swipe any direction to see the next text-box during dialogue.

Oranges is a single player narrative game in which you are cast as a new arrival to prison hoping to keep out of trouble. It was created in two weeks for the May 2019 One Room Bitsy Jam.

Make sure to follow and check my creator page every month for a new Bitsy game.

Bitsy is a game development engine created by Adam Le Doux to allow developers to quickly and easily create tiny games. It utilizes simple retro graphics and mechanics on the basis that restriction breeds creativity.

Please let me know your thoughts and feedback about Oranges below.
